name: @thecaringplace/service-report-parser
author: Daniel Kleco
description: A parser for parsing Service Reports exported from the FreeStore Foodbank's tracking system as PDFs and converting them into consumable JSON

scripts.build: node ./src/index.js parse-reports -i reports/downloaded -o reports/parsed && node ./src/index.js consolidate-reports -i reports/parsed -o reports && node ./src/index.js consolidate-financials -i reports/downloaded/financial-data -o reports/financials.json
